markdownRemark.html:
Poolish

Made the night before.

  • 500g Strong White Bread Flour
  • 500g 30C Water
  • ¼ tsp Allisons dried instant easy bake yeast

Loaf

Made in the morning.

  • 500g Strong White Bread Flour
  • 21g Salt
  • ¾ tsp Allisons dried instant easy bake yeast
  • 250g 40C water
  • All of the poolish
